name: An Ex-Mo and a Never-Mo Walk Into a Bar... Podcast

episodes.title: Season 2 Ep. 4 - Gay Away the Pray! With Guest Sam Nieves
episodes.description:
Source:
https://www.podbean.com/eau/pb-x93ty-18e794b

Your Two NoMos are devoting June to PRIDE!In this episode, we chat with Sam Nieves, of the Conversion Therapy Survivor Network. He talks about his journey out of the Mormon Church after being subjected to the harmful practice of "conversion therapy," and embracing his true self. Finding community and validation through the support of the non-profit for which he works (conversionsurvivor.org/) has been key.You can also find Sam on TikTok @CantPrayMeAway.
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Season 2 Ep. 3 - LIVE at PRIDE With Author Jonathan Alder!
episodes.description:
Source:
https://www.podbean.com/eau/pb-wnyb3-18dce63

Two NoMos Kate and Erika had the opportunity to sit down with author Jonathan Alder at the Utah Pride Festival. He wrote the book Closeted about his experiences as a gay student at BYU. His story is heartbreaking, poignant, and ultimately joyful and healing, as he has stepped into his true self, and is living authentically and thriving!His book is available here.
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Season 2 Ep. 2 - An ExMo and a NeverMo Walk Into a PRIDE Festival!
episodes.description: Two NoMos go LIVE for the first time at the Utah PRIDE Festival! It's a little loud, it's a little messy, it's a lot colorful, but so is life. Happy PRIDE, Everyone!!!!
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Kicking Back With Gay Jesus to Kick Off PRIDE!
episodes.description: What better way to celebrate PRIDE than to hang with Gay Jesus (aka Ryan Barlow)? He shares his evolution from devout member of the Mormon church, to beacon of hope, love, and support for the LGBTQ community as rainbow, sparkly Jesus.
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Season Two Opens With Gay Jesus!
episodes.description:
Source:
https://www.podbean.com/eau/pb-ev2ft-18c125a

Two NoMos have been on a short recording break to gear up for lots of upcoming events and engagements. But next Tuesday, June 3, we're back, Baby!We open season two with very special guest, "Gay Jesus," aka, Ryan Josiah. Spoiler alert: he is neither Jesus nor gay. But he is a local Salt Lake celebrity and activist, fighting the good fight for marginalized groups, particularly LGBTQ. And we were super stoked and honored that he shared his story and time with us.
 
Tune in on June 3 for the first episode of season two of, "An ExMo and a NeverMo Walk Into a Bar..."!
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Ep. 16 -  Temple (REALLY Do Not) Recommend Part Two
episodes.description:
Source:
https://www.podbean.com/eau/pb-bt3fx-189e4ab

The Mormon Temple and all its rituals are creepy.
In this episode, the Two NoMos dive further into the cult-like rituals and share some terrifying quotes from ExMormons who went through the Temple and came out scathed and traumatized.
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Ep. 15 - Temple (Do Not) Recommend
episodes.description:
Source:
https://www.podbean.com/eau/pb-88zbc-1893fcb

To enter the Mormon Temple, a member needs a "recommend." In other words, one needs to be deemed "worthy" enough, and of course, the hefty tithing needs to be paid. God always needs money.While this flies in the face of everything espoused by Jesus (the man, the myth, the legend - however you conceive of this figure), it also doesn't seem to be quite worth it. Once members are "inside" and have the full Temple experience, many feel slighted, anxious, or just plain creeped out by the full-on cultiness.In this episode, the Two NoMos explore some of these culty rituals.
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Ep. 14 - The (Sex) Life of Bryan
episodes.description: In the last episode, Kate and Erika discussed the harmful messaging from the Mormon church around sex, and the damage that does to women. This episode looks at the harm that this messaging does to men. From being grilled about the verboten masturbation, to being shamed for having any sexual feelings whatsoever, the church does a number on men as well as women. This organization may have lots of discriminatory practices and beliefs, but it doles out harm to all without prejudice or reservation.
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Shit! The Dildo!
episodes.description:
Source:
https://www.podbean.com/eau/pb-bmd76-187e9a7

Though the title of this episode sounds a lot dirtier than it actually is, it deserves an explicit content warning as Kate and Erika talk about sex, baby. 
The two NoMos discuss the harm caused by purity culture, aka the law of chastity, as taught in the Mormon church. They're joined by an amazing local group of women who were also negatively affected by the church's shame on sex.
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints
Purity Culture

episodes.title: Ep. 12 - General Conference "Glow"
episodes.description: In this episode, Kate and Erika break down the history of General Conference and discuss some of its controversial talks. They also report on their field trip to Temple Square on Conference Sunday...which Erika learned was also Jesus's birthday. Who knew?
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Ep. 11 - White and Delightsome is Frightsome!
episodes.description:
Source:
https://www.podbean.com/eau/pb-knnwr-186a4b6

In this episode, Kate and Erika welcome Channel Achenbach, a black woman who converted to the Mormon church in her teens and experienced all kinds of racism, Mormon style. She shares her exit out of the church, and the strength she's found along the way, advocating for herself and her children with grace.
 
Find her on TikTok: @sapid711
and Facebook: Channel Achenbach
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Ep. 10 - If the Mormon Church Were a Color, it'd be Beige
episodes.description: In this episode, Kate & Erika take a look at the beige handbook of standards, "For the Strength of Youth." Kate grew up with this handbook, which told her how to live as both a teen and an adult. Since leaving, she sees how this church has made lives like hers just as beige as the handbook.
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Both Sides, Now
episodes.description:
In this episode, Kate & Erika interview guest Kambria Davis, who is the "Mormonist lesbian," an exMo, astrologer, and energy healer. Together, they talk about the church's harmful practices against the LGBTQ community and take a look into spirituality post-Mormonism, wealth, and woo. 

Kambria also gives Kate & Erika a birth (not bird) chart reading.
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Ep. 8 - Unbaptized: And Into the Fiery Pits of Hell!
episodes.description: In this episode of "An ExMo and a NeverMo Walk Into a Bar..." Kate and Erika discuss Mormon baptism for both the living and the dead. Mormonism requires baptism for entrance into the Celestial Kingdom where only the most righteous can dwell. Since the early leaders of the Mormon church were anything BUT righteous, the Two NoMos use their self-proclaimed power to unbaptize Joseph Smith and Brigham Young.
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Women Can Birth but Not Bless; With Guest Poet Kaitlin Shetler
episodes.description:
Source:
https://www.podbean.com/eau/pb-fybsn-18274b5

Two NoMos Kate and Erika sit down with extraordinary poet and ex-church of Christ member, Kaitlin Shetler.
In this episode we discuss the similarities and differences between the Mormon Church and the church of Christ. We highlight the cult tactics employed by both, as well as the erasure of women in these organizations.
And as a special treat, Kaitlin reads one of her beautiful and powerful poems, "sometimes i wonder," about the erasure of Mother Mary's experience in birthing Jesus.
Kate and Erika were both a bit awestruck by Kaitlin's enormous talent.
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Keep Sweet, Pray and... NO WAY!
episodes.description: In the Mormon church, women are not allowed to hold any significant positions of leadership. They are prohibited from ever being the Prophet, a part of the Quorum, a Bishop, or even holding the Priesthood in their own homes. They can oversee the Women's Auxiliary and the Children's Ward, but even then, they must check in with male leaders about any decisions, and they are not permitted to make decisions on their own. In this episode, "Keep Sweet, Pray and... NO WAY!", Kate and Erika examine the second-class status of women in the Mormon church, and the ramifications of that for members.
subjects: _Blank
The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Ep. 5 - A Very Special Two NoMos
episodes.description: In this "after school special" episode of "An ExMo and a NeverMo Walk into a Bar..." Kate and Erika discuss some of the struggles that come with leaving The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, or Mormon Church. For many, a change in religion changes relationships with family and friends who are still members of the church.This one gets personal. Buckle up.
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Two Girls, One Cult
episodes.description:
Is the Mormon church a cult? Kate and Erika discuss on Episode Four of "An ExMo and  NeverMo Walk Into a Bar..."

And for "A Trying Moment," Kate "tries" the viral video from the dawn of the internet, "Two Girls, One Cup."

What does she think? Find out on February 11, when "Two Girls, Once Cult" drops!
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Fun With Polygamy! Featuring The Fresh King Benjamin
episodes.description: In this episode, Kate and Erika chat with The Fresh King Benjamin about his upbringing in a Mormon polygamist compound. Then we all get a little wild and decide to try out polygamy to see what all the fuss is about!
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: What the Hell is an Exmo Doing in a Bar?
episodes.description:
Source:
https://www.podbean.com/eau/pb-yrrwk-17d62c7

In this episode of "An ExMo and a NeverMo Walk into a Bar...", Kate and Erika discuss the absurdities of the Word of Wisdom, or code of health. Mormons will drink a chemical $#!+storm of Mountain Dew, while eschewing green tea as the devil's brew. And they do this in the name of health. Kate wouldn't even enter a bar while a member of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, and now she is cohosting a podcast over drinks with Erika at The Break Sports Grill.

Also, Erika gets dirty with a soda.

This podcast is NOT intended to strengthen the faith of members of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints. Listener discretion is advised.

***WARNING: This podcast is created for adult audiences only. Content warnings for this episode include explicit language and sexual references.

Our website www.twonomos.com is still under construction. Until it's published...

Follow Two NoMos on Facebook & Instagram

Follow Kate on TikTok, YouTube, and Instagram @Midlife Exmo

Follow Erika's blog at www.erikarachelstone.com
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints

episodes.title: Unlikely Friends Become Besties
episodes.description:
In this episode of An ExMo and a NeverMo Walk Into a Bar..., cohosts Kate (ExMormon) and Erika (NeverMormon) introduce themselves and their podcast. They share their experiences living in Salt Lake Valley, or "Mormon Central", and reflect on the unlikely friendship that developed between them. The episode explores their experiences with the Mormon church and the changes that led them to start this podcast together.

Recorded at The Break Sports Bar & Grill in South Jordan, Utah, this podcast is NOT intended to strengthen the faith of members of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints. Listener discretion is advised.
 

***WARNING: This podcast is created for adult audiences only. Content warnings for this episode include explicit language and sexual references.


Our website www.twonomos.com is still under construction. Until it's published...

Follow Two NoMos on Facebook

Follow Kate on TikTok, YouTube, and Instagram @Midlife Exmo

Follow Erika's blog at www.erikarachelstone.com
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints
